channel.title: Non existing item?
channel.description:
how do i make non existing items or items i have not added appear not as a weapon?
example:
15351: Non existing and it is automatically put in weapon spot. i know how to use item4 on 317 but, i cant figure out how to make the AUTO everything weapon into a AUTO everything playerShield or something.
thanks.

item.title: Non existing item?
item.dc:creator: @Skorge Skorge
item.description:
@Skorge wrote:

In the item.java there are lists consisting of bodies, capes, amulets. Find the proper list and add the id in there properly
To change the shop/alch price + stats go to the item.cfgâ€¦ First few sets of numbers = price
Last few sets of numbers = stats

Read full topic
